divs: Sighting Detailsme and my friends where walking back from mcdonalds to the park, and my friend noticed something in the sky, it was really far in the sky it stayed in place without blinking but only glowing a yellow white color and then as we looked at it it split apart and started blinking and slowly coming down and then disappeared into the clouds.
Summary: circle in the sky, glowing yellowish whitish, split apart and started blinking then dissapeared
